title: I cant load into any of my matches
body: Since I got into the new client I cant load into any of my matches and the client is really laggy, I cant keep up my typing or responses with people in my messages and I can barely ban a champ that I want with 10 seconds to spare. I cant load into any of my matches, I tried 6 times and now i have leaver buster so I need to see anything and everything I can do to fix this.

replies.body: Having problems loading into matches typically means there's something blocking your network from being able to make a solid connection with our servers. Having problems with chat messages not going through quickly backs up some of my connection suspicions, so let's first go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure the main issue isn't there.
